args: Production-harden study-mode-api with ChatKit integration: Copy production patterns from TaskFlow (chatkit_store, auth, config, database) and staging-merge microservices (redis_cache, rate_limit, red_lock). Convert to uv project with pyproject.toml, create Dockerfile, add GitHub content fetching with Redis cache, implement JWT/JWKS auth, add rate limiting, fix CORS, add health checks. Target: 50,000+ concurrent users.
